睇緊QM嗰陣, 發現自己搞唔清photon同埋electromagnetic wave.
其實可唔可以話一粒photon係對應一個形式係 u(x, t) = A exp(i(kx- omega t)) 嘅 plane wave?

應該要QFT先至可以正確define到photon

最簡單嘅講法應該係 “A photon corresponds to a one-particle state obtained from having quantized EM field (EM potential) act on the vacuum state in your Hilbert space.”
雖然咁講好似唔太rigorous
